dublinCore.dc:title: 118 HR 6744 IH: No VA Resources for Illegal Aliens Act
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Bost (for himself, Mr. Self, Mr. Bergman, Mr. Scott Franklin of Florida, Mrs. Miller-Meeks, and Mr. Murphy) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Veterans' Affairs

form.official-title: To prohibit the Secretary of Veterans Affairs from providing health care to, or engaging in claims processing for health care for, any individual unlawfully present in the United States who is not eligible for health care under the laws administered by the Secretary.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the No VA Resources for Illegal Aliens Act.

section.header: Limitation on care or processing of claims for care from Department of Veterans Affairs
section.text: The Secretary of Veterans Affairs may not provide health care to, and may not engage in claims processing for health care for, any individual unlawfully present in the United States who is not eligible for health care under the laws administered by the Secretary.
